Text:
Hello, i'm new here and need a little help. I downloaded this film from here. I do not know why but it dowloaded straight into my Limewire  
(I also have Utorrent but have no idea how it works!!!)  
The picture is perfect but there is no sound. Can someone please tell me if I need to do something to get sound? or is the film faulty?

A friend in England downloaded it from here using Miro like me, a couple of days ago and she told me it's ok. But I'm not very good with computers. . Can you please tell me what I need to do to get sound? (I have a Mac)

I installed Perian to fix the sound problem and it did the trick.
Thanks for an excellent movie. 
A10/V10
